aboutpara: Passionate and resourceful Computer Science undergraduate at SRM Institute of Science and Technology with hands-on experience in machine learning, mobile application development, and software engineering. Demonstrated ability in conducting impactful research, building predictive models, and crafting user-centric applications. Proficient in various programming languages and frameworks including Python, JavaScript, React Native, and TensorFlow. Proven leadership skills through managing teams and driving successful initiatives. Committed to continuous learning and exploring innovative solutions to real-world challenges.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, UI designer.
resume.description: Enthusiastic Computer Science undergrad at SRM Institute of Science and Technology. Skilled in machine learning, mobile app development, and software engineering. Excels in research, predictive modeling, and crafting user-friendly apps. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, React Native, and TensorFlow. A natural leader with a passion for innovation and problem-solving.

experiences.position: Research and Development Intern at IIT Madras
experiences.bullets: Creating a predictive model for tide values with the dual purpose of replacing missing data during recording device maintenance or downtime and forecasting future values,  Designing and developing a mobile application aimed at facilitating seamless communication between sailors and navigating officers, Conducted thorough data analysis to identify key factors influencing tide patterns incorporating real-time data feeds into the prediction model

experiences.position: Artificial Intelligence Intern at Tech Mahindra
experiences.bullets: Supported the development of machine learning and deep learning models under the guidance of senior AI re- searchers., Implemented algorithms and models using TensorFlow YOLOv8 Keras Pandas and Matplotlib contributing to the development of 2 successful projects

education.universityName: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
